Little Snitch Rules

  • Applications - rules for various 3rd-party apps to operate. Subscribe

  • Applications (Prefixed) - variant of Applications ruleset, except apps are in /Applications/Homebrew or ~/Applications. Mostly for my own use because I run Homebrew under a separate account that doesn't have write access to /Applications. Subscribe

  • System Services - finely-scoped rules for system functions to operate. Subscribe
